entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023
